name: Lost WASTED and Found
description:
Known Bugs
  • The start button can sometimes take a while to work, give it a couple clicks and wait for a few seconds
Summary

Game made for Global Game Jam 2021 (Vancouver).

Help these drunk bastards find their lost items by engaging in "highly intellectual conversation" and throwing their shit back at them. Find all their items and you will became employee of the month! (but your salary will still remain the same).

How to Play

Click through the dialogue options to talk to them.

Hold ALT and move your mouse around to see your work area. The following is at your fingertips :

  • To the left : the calendar and schedule
  • To the right : the computer, interact with it to see all the items and info in the system
  • Behind you : all the items

Pick up the items by clicking on them with your mouse. 

Click again to throw the items!

Developers :
